name: Garmin Fenix 6X Pro - Unisex
description: The newest entry into the do-everything Fenix line blends smartwatch function with advanced training tools and a backcountry GPS. The Fenix 6 has a bigger screen and a more efficient GPS than before. The latest generation Elevate heart rate monitor takes your pulse off your wrist. Heart rate data is used for everything from advanced fitness metrics to daily calorie consumption. When you need more info, or a little motivation, the free Connect app pairs your phone to your watch. Connect lets you download training plans, review activities, receive texts, social media alerts and emails, track the weather and more. The Pro-series can play your favourite songs and podcasts, and comes loaded with maps. Day-to-day activity tracking, sleep monitoring and music make the Fenix 6 useful every day, not just on training days.Built-in modes for biking, running, swimming (indoor and out), multisport, gym (strength training, cardio and elliptical, stair stepping, rowing and yoga), golfing (41,000+ course maps), skiing (2000+ ski resort maps) and more.Includes North American map data with room to add maps.Multiple map themes to customize the map screen, from heatmaps, to ski resorts, marine settings and more.Point of interest navigation, search for: restaurants, attractions, accommodation, etc.Round-trip mapping: choose a distance and get course options that start and stop in the same spot – great for set-distance runs.Trendline™ routing uses Garmin user’s route data to find the most popular route.Stream music through a phone using Spotify, Amazon Music, and more. Download playlists and podcasts directly via a music service, e.g. Spotify (premium required), or add MP3s from your computer.Synched playlists can be updated via Wi-Fi.Holds up to 2000 songs.ClimbPro™ lets you know the grade, the total ascent and current position on a colour coded elevation profile, so you can pace yourself.PacePro™, set your desired pace, then compare it to your distance splits, the Fenix 6 compares your needed pace vs your goal pace for each split and for the course.Body Battery™ tracks daily energy levels, monitoring what drains your energy (exercise) and recharges your energy (rest, food), letting you train smarter.Garmin Pay™, make payments with your watch (if supported by your bank).Strava Segment integration, preloaded and on-the-fly (through your phone), lets you know when starred segments begin and shows instantaneous data, comparing it to your PR and the current KOM or QOM, and provides results once complete. (requires Strava premium)LiveTrack, share your location and fitness data during activities (through a phone).Connects to 3 satellite constellations (GPS, GLONASS and Galileo) and caches satellite positions.Elevate™ V3 optical heart rate monitor has a red LED for Pulse Ox data and even works while swimming.Physiological data: VO2 max, a race predictor, recovery advisor and performance indicator – many take temperature and altitude into consideration.Training load uses data from your past 7-days of workouts to let you know if you are overtraining, under-training, or on the right path.Compatible with running dynamics sensors (sold separately).Incident detection uses internal sensors to detect accidents. In the case of an accident a message and your location will be sent through your paired phone to your emergency contacts.If you feel unsafe, assistance mode sends out a LiveTrack link letting your contacts know where you are.24/7 activity tracking learns your activity level and guides you towards a more active lifestyle.On board sleep tracking, shows total sleep hours as well as movement and restful sleep.Free Garmin Connect app lets you review activities, receive texts, social media alerts, emails; download training plans, track the weather and more – via Bluetooth to your phone.Connect IQ allows you to download apps, widgets, templates, data fields and more.UltraTrac™ mode reduces the GPS communication to save battery.Pre-set and custom power profiles let you maximize your battery’s power.Tough, non-reflective Gorilla Glass© crystal.ABC data comes in via the internal altimeter, barometer and a tilt-compensated compass.In the box: fēnix 6, charging cable and documentation.
